detail_desc: Trainers in imitation leather and imitation suede with mesh sections. Padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Mesh linings made from recycled polyester and imitation leather insoles. Chunky soles.
Kangol x H&M. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and recycled polyester blend. High, elasticated waist, a print motif on the front, side pockets, and elastication at the hems.

Trousers in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with reinforced sections. Regular waist with belt loops, a zip fly and button and straight legs. Front pockets, a back pocket and leg pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud.
Sports jacket in thermal faux shearling with nylon sections. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Elasticated trims around the cuffs and hem.
Sports jacket in thermal faux shearling with nylon sections. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Elasticated trims around the cuffs and hem.

Kangol x H&M. Short, fitted dress in jersey made from a cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top with double-layered shoulder straps and a cut-out section at the front. Contrasting colour panels with a drawstring down the sides that ends at the hem.
Socks in a fine knit with a compressive section over the foot and a ribbed shaft. The socks are made partly from recycled polyester.

Short-sleeved polo shirt and a pair of matching shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Shirt with a collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, and wide legs with short slits at the hems.
Short, fitted dress in soft, ribbed viscose jersey with a polo neck, long sleeves and a large cut-out section at the back.
Ankle-length treggings in supersoft corduroy. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ankle-length treggings in supersoft corduroy. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Slightly shorter top with a bodice in soft jersey and sleeves in crisp cotton poplin. V-neck, a wrapover, draped front with a concealed zip in one side, and a square neckline at the back. Long puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication around the shoulders and at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Elasticated fabric scrunchies in various designs.
Trousers in soft, rib-knit merino wool. High waist with covered elastication and gently flared legs.
Platform ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side. Jersey linings made from recycled polyester, and imitation leather insoles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Leggings in imitation leather jersey with an elasticated waist.

Suit trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication at the back and pleats at the front, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Diagonal front pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Wrapover front with visible ties at one side and concealed ties at the other. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a frill-trimmed Peter Pan collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gathered seam at the waist creating a softly draping peplum.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a viscose blend with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases and easy-access flap pockets. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Narrow Alice bands in various designs. One glittery, one with pearly plastic beads and one covered in satin with a decorative bow.
Ankle-length trousers in soft leather with a high waist with concealed elastication and a zip in one side. Slim legs with a gentle flare to the hem and a seam above the knee.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap jetted front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.

Slightly longer jacket in soft faux shearling with contrasting colour sections in woven fabric. High collar, a zip down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Zipped chest pocket and diagonal welt front pockets. Unlined.
Short coat in soft faux shearling with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Long, wide coat in a felted wool blend with a large collar, buttons at the front and long, wide sleeves. Diagonal welt front pockets and a pleat at the back. Unlined.

Boxy cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and cut-out sections with ties at the back. Concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Car coat in twill with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, diagonal welt front pockets and inner pockets. Long raglan sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined in satin made from recycled polyester.
Slightly shorter, long-sleeved top in jersey crêpe made from a viscose blend with a round neckline, an opening at the back and a double-layered panel at the hem with ties at the back.
Slightly shorter, long-sleeved top in jersey crêpe made from a viscose blend with a round neckline, an opening at the back and a double-layered panel at the hem with ties at the back.
Slightly shorter, long-sleeved top in jersey crêpe made from a viscose blend with a round neckline, an opening at the back and a double-layered panel at the hem with ties at the back.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow trim, gathered shoulder seams for a draped effect and short puff sleeves.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow trim, gathered shoulder seams for a draped effect and short puff sleeves.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow trim, gathered shoulder seams for a draped effect and short puff sleeves.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a round metal buckle decorated with pearly plastic beads. Width 3.5 cm.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a small, gathered stand-up collar, covered buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and narrow cuffs with covered buttons. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a small, gathered stand-up collar, covered buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and narrow cuffs with covered buttons. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit decorated with rhinestone studs. Dropped shoulders, long, wide balloon sleeves with close-fitting cuffs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft jersey.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft jersey.
Boxy-style, cropped top in soft cotton jersey. Round neckline with a jacquard-knit trim, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Boxy-style, cropped top in soft cotton jersey. Round neckline with a jacquard-knit trim, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Ballet shoes in soft satin. Concealed elastic strap over the foot with a bow on top and concealed elastication around the opening. Soft cotton jersey linings and insoles, and suede soles.

Long-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, and two buttons at the top. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Long-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, and two buttons at the top. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Socks knitted in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Socks knitted in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Ankle-length boiler suit in cotton twill with a soft finish. Collar, concealed buttons at the top and covered elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Flap chest pockets and diagonal front pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and wide, gently tapered legs.
Quilted smartphone bag in imitation leather with four card slots, a flap and concealed magnetic press-stud, and a narrow, detachable metal chain shoulder strap. Length of shoulder strap 115 cm.
Boxy-style bomber jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and diagonal front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Lined.
Short dressing gown in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets, and covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatpants is recycled.

Sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets, and covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatpants is recycled.

Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a key chain. High waist with pleats at the front and covered elastication at the back, zip fly with a button, side pockets, a fake back pocket and wide, gently flared legs.
Biker shorts in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. High, elasticated waist.
Biker shorts in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. High, elasticated waist.

Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with contrasting colour panels in woven fabric. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved polo shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbed cuffs.

Joggers in sturdy, slightly heavier jersey made from a cotton blend with covered elastication, a drawstring and a press-stud at the waist. Diagonal welt pockets at the front and one welt back pocket. Straight, gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases.

Joggers in sturdy, slightly heavier jersey made from a cotton blend with covered elastication, a drawstring and a press-stud at the waist. Diagonal welt pockets at the front and one welt back pocket. Straight, gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases.

Knee-length shirt jacket in soft faux shearling with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets, pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Knee-length shirt jacket in soft faux shearling with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets, pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Knee-length shirt jacket in soft faux shearling with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets, pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Straight-style nightdress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

Jacket in woven fabric with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Stand-up collar with a drawstring, a zip down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams, dropped shoulders and covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a drawstring at the waist. Lined.

Jacket in woven fabric with a filling of 80% down and 20% feathers. Stand-up collar with a drawstring, a zip down the front, discreet pockets in the side seams, dropped shoulders and covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam with a drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Ribbed polo-neck collar in soft cashmere.
Ribbed polo-neck collar in soft cashmere.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar with a small frill trim, an opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck and a V-shaped yoke front and back. Long, wide puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam above the hem for added volume. Unlined.
Skirt in patterned chiffon with wide smocking at the waist and two flounced tiers. Lined.
Fitted, calf-length dress in stretch jersey with zigzag seams around the neckline and armholes. Narrow cut at the top, a racer back and a slit in one side.
Fitted, calf-length dress in stretch jersey with zigzag seams around the neckline and armholes. Narrow cut at the top, a racer back and a slit in one side.
